title: Object Classification
description: An informal classification of the type of objects within the ObjectGroup, using a hierarchical structure.

objectClassificationLevel.description: The level of the ObjectClassification in the hierarchy.

objectClassificationName.description: A short title describing this ObjectClassification as a class, unit or grouping.

objectClassificationParent.description: The immediate parent of the ObjectClassification in a self-referential hierarchy.

objectClassification.description: One or more Object Classifications relating to the Object Classification

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Object Classification

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Object Classification

measurementOrFact.description: One or more Measurement Or Facts relating to the Object Classification
